sentences.english: Break an egg and offer it to the deceased with some rice and rum.
sentences.chinese: 打個蛋和米飯還有朗姆酒一起供奉給故人。

sentences.english: Yan had no information on the enemy, sober Canmeng send bleak.

sentences.english: September Shuangtian water is cold, old friends to spend levy Saddle West.

sentences.english: So many old friends' faces, all floating before my eyes.

sentences.english: "The old friend west dismisses Yellow Crane Tower , fireworks goes to Yangzhou in March". Come from that poem?

sentences.english: Jun persuade even a glass of wine to make the West a reason people Guan Yang.

sentences.english: Lonely, when reading, just like a peek into the face of a dead person.

definition: to see each other/to meet in person
to recall/to bring to mind/to reminisce
old friend/sb who passed the county level imperial exam (in Ming dynasty)
to leave (on a long journey)/to part from sb
